name: Talkdesk, Inc.
description: Developer of cloud-based call center software designed to help growing businesses improve customer satisfaction while reducing costs. The company's platform uses IVR, ACD, and skills-based routing technology that seamlessly integrates ITSM and CSM service desks, enabling businesses to communicate with their customers and manage the entire call center operations using the web.
one_liner: Developer of cloud-based call center software designed to help growing businesses improve customer satisfaction while reducing costs. The company's platform uses IVR, ACD, and skills-based routing technology that seamlessly integrates ITSM and CSM service desks, enabling businesses to communicate with their customers and manage the entire call center operations using the web.
